description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget called ControlBar. It provides a user interface component that includes controls for toggling sound effects, undoing the last move, and restarting the game. The widget interacts with a GameProvider to manage game state actions and properties, such as enabling/disabling undo based on the game score.

classes.name: ControlBar
classes.description: A stateless Flutter widget that displays game control buttons such as undo, restart, and sound toggle. It rebuilds based on game state provided by GameProvider.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the ControlBar, creating buttons that interact with the game provider.

methods.name: _canUndo
methods.description: Determines if the undo action is available based on the current game score.
